org.ohmage.streams

Class StreamPointBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ohmage.streams.StreamPointBuilder

  • public class StreamPointBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    StreamPointBuilder class which makes it easy to create a point for a stream and send it to ohmage.

      • write

        public void write(ContentResolver resolver)
        Send this point to ohmage.

        If you have many points to send within a few milliseconds of each other, you will get better performance by calling #write(StreamWriter) or writeAsync(AsyncBulkInsertHandler).

        This call will block until the point has been saved in ohmage.

        Parameters:
        resolver - a ContentResolver that is used to save the point

      • writeAsync

        public void writeAsync(AsyncQueryHandler handler,
              int token,
              java.lang.Object cookie)
        Asynchronously send this point to ohmage.

        If you have many points to send within a few milliseconds of each other, you will get better performance by calling #write(StreamWriter) or writeAsync(AsyncBulkInsertHandler).

        This call returns without waiting for ohmage to save the point. Implement AsyncQueryHandler#onInsertComplete for the handler provided to get callbacks whenever a point is saved to ohmage.

        Before sending data to ohmage, the stream should check that the content provider exists by calling StreamContract.checkContentProviderExists(ContentResolver)

        Parameters:
        handler - an AsyncQueryHandler to send the point
        token - A token passed into AsyncQueryHandler#onInsertComplete to identify this write operation.
        cookie - An object that gets passed into AsyncQueryHandler#onInsertComplete

      • writeAsync

        public void writeAsync(AsyncBulkInsertHandler handler)
        Asynchronously queue this point to be sent to ohmage in a batch.

        If there is more time than the flush delay of the AsyncBulkInsertHandler between points you will get better performance by calling write(ContentResolver resolver) or writeAsync(AsyncQueryHandler handler, int token, Object cookie).

        This call returns without waiting for ohmage to save points. Implement AsyncBulkInsertHandler.onBulkInsertComplete(int) for the handler provided to get callbacks whenever batches of points are saved to ohmage.

        Before sending data to ohmage, the stream should check that the content provider exists by calling StreamContract.checkContentProviderExists(ContentResolver)

        Parameters:
        handler - an AsyncBulkInsertHandler to send batches of points
